privacyText: Alevi App values your privacy. No personal data is shared with third parties.
termsText: The app content is intended to introduce Alevi-Bektashi culture.

knowledgeItems.title: What is Alevism?
knowledgeItems.content: Alevism is a path of the heart that carries the love of Hak-Muhammed-Ali, accepts the guardianship of Imam Ali, and adopts Haji Bektash Veli's motto 'Master your hands, waist, and tongue'.

stories.title: The Lion and the Gazelle
stories.content: Those who came to Haji Bektash Veli saw a lion and a gazelle sitting peacefully in his lap. This symbolizes the peace commanded by the perfect human being.

lokmaRecipes.title: Ashura (Noah's Pudding)
lokmaRecipes.ingredients: Wheat, Chickpeas, Beans, Dried Fruits, Sugar
lokmaRecipes.steps: Boil all ingredients separately. Combine in a large pot with prayers.

semahItems.title: Semah of the Forty
semahItems.content: It represents the gathering of the Forty Saints visited by Prophet Muhammad after Miraj.

niyazItems.title: Table Prayer (Gulbank)

quotes.quote: Hurt not, even if you are hurt.

quotes.quote: The end of the path not guided by science is darkness.
quotes.author: Haji Bektash Veli
